item.title: WordsList-词根
item.author: miaomiaoyangyxy@gmail.com (MiaoMiaoYang)
item.description: -press words explanation audio remark depress vt. 抑制；降低；削弱；使沮丧；使萧条 Your browser does not support the audio element The rainy days always depress me. Some will depress excitatory neurons and some will enhance inhibitory neurons. repress vt. 镇压；克制 Your browser does not support the audio element -ception words explanation audio remark perception n.
